<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Force Update record</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {



    var secondsValue = 10; // 1min
    var seconds = parseInt(secondsValue, 10) * 1000;
    var start = parseInt(new Date().getTime()) + seconds;
    while (start > parseInt(new Date().getTime())) {
        // do nothing
    }

    //The below script will execute after 10 seconds sepcified in secondsValue

    var parRec = current.getValue('sys_id');
    var gr = new GlideRecord('dmn_demand');
    gr.get(parRec);
    if (gr.isValidRecord()) {
        // Call gr.update twice ON PURPOSE.
        // It's a workaround for gr.setForceUpdate(true), that can't be called from scoped apps.
        gr.update();
        gr.update();
    }





})(current, previous);]]></script>
